title: Karaoke
description: Featuring the ML5 Posenet model and p5.js in combination with the client webcam, this app allows users to experience the fun of a karaoke room, while staying safely at home. After signing up or logging in, the user simply selects a song, and a costume or filter will appear.  Costumes move with the user as they sing and dance to the music. And last but not least, users can take a screen shot, which downloads direclty to their device, allowing them to share on facebook or instagram.

title: Park Pack
description: Create a user profile for your dog and view other dog profiles to find matches.  Add matches to your dog's 'pack'.  Live-chat with other dog-owners to discuss all things dog and/or arrange play-dates.

title: Bookflix
teaser: Loved the movie? Find the book!
description: Search the name of your favorite movie to find related books.  If you like the books, add them to your library page. Search results are stored in session storage while on the search page. Books added to library page are stored in local storage.

title: Employee Directory
description: A staff directory with a dynamic React front-end. Search for employees by name.  Sort by name, phone, email, or date of birth.

title: Paddles-UP Coder
description: Sign-up or Log-in to access your profile.  Add new blog-posts, edit your existing posts, and comment on other users' posts.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Find the local weather and five-day forecast for any city in the world.  Search results are saved to local storage, allowing user to view previous search history.
